Tributes have been paid to a Wales supporter who died in Qatar after travelling there for the World Cup. The Welsh FA named the fan as Kevin Davies. 
The 62-year-old was in Doha with his son and fri… [+1986 chars]

articles.author: Tom Blow
articles.title: Graeme Souness slams "selfish" England star amid World Cup 2022 draw with USA - The Mirror
articles.description: England captain Harry Kane failed to score in either of their first two World Cup fixtures against Iran and the United States and picked up a knock in the former fixture
articles.content:
Graeme Souness has labelled Harry Kane "selfish" for playing on with an injury during England's 6-2 win against Iran on Monday.

articles.title: Gareth Southgate can call upon key Arsenal star to save England's World Cup 2022 campaign - Football.London
articles.description: England are in danger of seeing their early work in the World Cup undone, even if they progress through to the knockouts
